p.k: The girls learn to appreciate each others’ styles after having to each fight solo. / While visiting the lake, Buttercup vows to capture a legendary uncatchable clawdad. / The holidays are Mojo's favourite time… for ruining everything! But this year, he may just learn the reason for the season. / When Bubbles gets the lead in the school play, Blossom's jealousy consumes her.
